mapper.insert: insert into s_tbl_product(p_name, p_price, p_cate1, p_cate2, p_stock, s_id, p_dis_rate, p_favo, p_sale_cnt, p_img) values(#{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_cate1}, #{p_cate2}, #{p_stock}, #{s_id}, #{p_dis_rate}, #{p_favo}, #{p_sale_cnt}, #{p_img})
mapper.select: select max(p_no) from s_tbl_product where s_id = 'seller1'
mapper.insert: insert into s_tbl_option(o_title, o_cont, o_stock, p_name, s_id, p_no) values(#{o_title}, #{o_cont}, #{o_stock}, #{p_name}, #{s_id}, #{p_no})
insert into s_tbl_image(i_img, i_cont, p_name, s_id, p_no) values(#{i_img}, #{i_cont}, #{p_name}, #{s_id}, #{p_no})
